enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve managing the lifecycle of a StringBuilder instance, with borrowBuilder providing a new instance and releaseBuilder managing its release.
releaseBuilder interacts with the SoftPool to manage StringBuilder instances, similar to how SoftPool.borrow() provides instances.
releaseBuilder converts the StringBuilder to a String, similar to how StringBuilder.toString() provides the string representation.
releaseBuilder resets the StringBuilder's content, similar to how StringBuilder.delete clears its content.
